org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.providers.IAeStorageConnection

Packages that use IAeStorageConnection
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage This package contains classes for storing the state of BPEL processes to an external storage facility. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.exist   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.providers   
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql This package contains classes for storing the state of BPEL processes to a SQL database. 
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb Contains classes and interfaces that form the base implementation of XMLDB database support.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.process Contains the storage classes that implement a XMLDB version of the Process storage.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.queue Contains the storage classes that implement a XMLDB version of the Queue storage.  
org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.xmldb.urn
